title: Unique & Unusual Ores
description: Dive into a world of rich detail and imaginative design with our collection of over 150 unique and unusual ore icons, tailor-made for video games.
longDescription:
Dive into a world of rich detail and imaginative design with our collection of over 120 unique and unusual ore icons, tailor-made for video games. Whether you're developing a mystical RPG, a mining simulation, or any game that seeks to enrich its world with distinctive minerals and metals, this collection offers an unparalleled variety of designs that will set your game apart.


Key Features:


  • Diverse Range: With more than 120 icons, explore ores that range from the magical and mysterious to the rare and undiscovered.


  • High-Quality Designs: Crafted with precision, each icon boasts sharp, vibrant details that look stunning in-game and ensures your ores stand out.


  • Versatile Use: Suitable for a variety of genres and platforms â€“ from mobile games to PC masterpieces.


  • Value for Money: Priced at just $24.99, this collection offers unbeatable value, adding depth and variety to your game without breaking the bank.


Empower your game with minerals that tell a story. With the Unique & Unusual Ores collection, your players will discover, mine, and cherish each treasure they come across. Secure your set today and give your game the depth and flavour it deserves.


Technical Information:


121 Individual PNG's with transparent backgrounds
